text: Cochin City Motor Thozhilali Union, a trade union of transportation worker in Cochin, India. CCMTU is affiliated to the Centre of Indian Trade Unions. The president of CCMTU is T.S. Shanmughadas. Category:Centre of Indian Trade Unions Category:Trade unions in Kerala Category:Organisations based in Kochi
title: Cochin City Motor Thozhilali Union
